base.note: Base value that gets added to each city.

capital.note: Value that only gets added to capitals.

park.note: Happiness gained for each Park in the city.

stabilizer.note: Happiness gained after each rebellion caused by unhappiness. (To avoid eternal rebellions)

popgrowth.note: Happiness gained after choosing Population Growth

mindaggers.note: Minimum amount of daggers to spawn during a rebellion caused by unhappiness.

maxdaggers.note: Maximum amount of daggers to spawn during a rebellion caused by unhappiness.

mindbender.note: Happiness gained for each enemy mindbender (or any unit with Convert ability) in city territory.

naturedivider.note: You get +1 Happiness for every N unimproved tiles. (No buildings)

garrison.note: Happiness gained if a (friendly) unit is stationed in the city.

threshold.note: Amount of happiness required for a city to get its production boost.

boostpercentage.note: Percentage points of which happy cities boost star production by. (integer value!)

rebellionpercentage.note: Percentage points for rebellion per each unhappiness. (integer value!)

segments.note: Amount of segments in the city bar to show. Might be buggy to change i should rewrite that code some time...

obstructedrule.note: Temples, if an enemy unit is on them, provide no happiness. Disable with 0, enable with 1.
